author: CTPPS
body:
This PR is a follow up of #17317, in addition addressing several issues in the CTPPS geometry code by adopting the short-term solution proposed in https://github.com/CTPPS/cmssw/issues/12 :
 * removed non-thread-safe MeasuredGeometryProducer
 * avoided manipulations with DDCompactView
 * removed redundant Measured geometry
 * Real and Misaligned geometries are built on top of Ideal geometry

Tests done:
  * no change in Roman Pot hit distributions: [compare.pdf](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/files/779885/compare.pdf)
  * `runTheMatrix.py -l limited` gives: `13 10 5 4 3 1 1 1 tests passed, 3 3 5 0 0 0 0 0 failed` The failures had one of the following signatures
    * DAS_ERROR
    * `unable to load /afs/cern.ch/work/j/jkaspar/software/ctpps/development/ctpps_geometry_thread_safe/CMSSW_9_0_0_pre4/lib/slc6_amd64_gcc530/poisoned/plugin-poisoned-ValidationHcalDigis.so because /afs/cern.ch/work/j/jkaspar/software/ctpps/development/ctpps_geometry_thread_safe/CMSSW_9_0_0_pre4/lib/slc6_amd64_gcc530/poisoned/plugin-poisoned-ValidationHcalDigis.so: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory`
    * `ImportError: No module named L1TrackTrigger.L1TrackTrigger_cff`
  None of which seem related to this PR.
title: CTPPS: diamonds geometry and RecHits (from #17317) and making CTPPS geometry thread safe
